html:
Sleepy eyes, early morning
Foggy mind, just getting up
First coffee drank, will have another
Few days ago there was summer solstice
Solar panels gather energy
Silently power up the building
I’ve spent whole spring here
The spring flowers are long gone
And death harvests every second
Behind closed doors, no one sees
Sometimes someone makes it visible
But it’s against the savior-vivre
Everyone is aware, no one complains
Sometimes someone only cries a little
Alone on a big block stair case
Because they know their life is over
title: Sleepy
